languages.text: "Элантах, я понимаю, что..." {n}Ирлиэт обрывается на полуслове и изумленно смотрит на свой нагрудник, в котором тускло поблескивает расколовшийся камень душ.{/n} "Милостивая Иша..."
"Elantach, I understand that..." {n}Yrliet stops mid-sentence and looks down at her breastplate in astonishment, seeing her shattered spirit stone.{/n} "O merciful Isha..."
languages.original_text: "Элантах, я понимаю, что..." {n}Ирлиэт обрывается на полуслове и изумленно смотрит на свой нагрудник, в котором тускло поблескивает расколовшийся камень душ.{/n} "Милостивая Иша..."

traits.locale_text: "Elantach, I understand that..." {n}Yrliet stops mid-sentence and looks down at her breastplate, bewildered, where the shattered spirit stone is.{/n} "O merciful Isha..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Elantach, I understand that..." {n}Yrliet stops mid-sentence and looks down at her breastplate, bewildered, where the shattered spirit stone is.{/n} "O merciful Isha..."

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “外界人，我理解……”{n}话说到一半，伊莉耶特低头看了一眼胸甲，惊讶地发现灵魂石已经碎了。{/n}“噢，爱莎在上……”
languages.original_text: "Elantach, I understand that..." {n}Yrliet stops mid-sentence and looks down at her breastplate in astonishment, seeing her shattered spirit stone.{/n} "O merciful Isha..."

traits.locale_text: “外界人，我理解……”{n}话说到一半，伊莉耶特低头看了一眼胸甲，惊讶地发现灵魂石已经碎了。{/n}“噢，爱莎在上……”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Elantach, me parece que...». {n}Yrliet se detiene en mitad de la frase, baja la mirada a su coraza y contempla anonadada la joya espiritual resquebrajada.{/n} «Oh, por la misericordia de Isha...».
languages.original_text: "Elantach, I understand that..." {n}Yrliet stops mid-sentence and looks down at her breastplate in astonishment, seeing her shattered spirit stone.{/n} "O merciful Isha..."

traits.locale_text: «Elantach, me parece que...». {n}Yrliet se detiene en mitad de la frase, baja la mirada a su coraza y contempla anonadada la joya espiritual resquebrajada.{/n} «Oh, por la misericordia de Isha...».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Elantach, je crois que... » {n}Yrliet s'interrompt, baisse les yeux sur son plastron et découvre avec sidération que sa pierre-esprit s'est brisée.{/n} « Ô, miséricordieuse Isha... »
languages.original_text: "Elantach, I understand that..." {n}Yrliet stops mid-sentence and looks down at her breastplate in astonishment, seeing her shattered spirit stone.{/n} "O merciful Isha..."

traits.locale_text: « Elantach, je crois que... » {n}Yrliet s'interrompt, baisse les yeux sur son plastron et découvre avec sidération que sa pierre-esprit s'est brisée.{/n} « Ô, miséricordieuse Isha... »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Elantach, ich denke ..." {n}Yrliet bricht mitten im Satz ab, blickt erstaunt hinab auf ihre Brustplatte und sieht ihren zerstörten Seelenstein.{/n} "O gnädige Isha ..."
languages.original_text: "Elantach, I understand that..." {n}Yrliet stops mid-sentence and looks down at her breastplate in astonishment, seeing her shattered spirit stone.{/n} "O merciful Isha..."

traits.locale_text: "Elantach, ich denke ..." {n}Yrliet bricht mitten im Satz ab, blickt erstaunt hinab auf ihre Brustplatte und sieht ihren zerstörten Seelenstein.{/n} "O gnädige Isha ..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「エランタ、わかっているんだ…」{n}ユリエットは途中で言葉を止め、自分の胸当てに目を落とし、砕け散った魂縛石を驚いたように見つめる。{/n}「ああ、慈悲深きイシャよ…」
languages.original_text: "Elantach, I understand that..." {n}Yrliet stops mid-sentence and looks down at her breastplate in astonishment, seeing her shattered spirit stone.{/n} "O merciful Isha..."

traits.locale_text: 「エランタ、わかっているんだ…」{n}ユリエットは途中で言葉を止め、自分の胸当てに目を落とし、砕け散った魂縛石を驚いたように見つめる。{/n}「ああ、慈悲深きイシャよ…」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Elantach, anlıyorum ama..." {n}Yrliet, şaşkınlıkla göğüs plakasına bakarak parçalanmış ruh taşını görüyor.{/n} "Merhametli İşa aşkına..."
languages.original_text: "Elantach, I understand that..." {n}Yrliet stops mid-sentence and looks down at her breastplate in astonishment, seeing her shattered spirit stone.{/n} "O merciful Isha..."
